name: CO2 emissions (Aggregate dataset (2021))
title: CO2 emissions (Aggregate dataset (2021))
description:
This dataset has been compiled by Our World in Data based on several sources.

CO2 emissions data is sourced from the Global Carbon Project:
Global Carbon Project. (2020). Supplemental data of Global Carbon Budget 2020 (Version 1.0) [Data set]. Global Carbon Project. https://doi.org/10.18160/gcp-2020

The full CO2 emissions dataset from the Global Carbon Project has been provided by Dr Robbie Andrew: https://folk.universitetetioslo.no/roberan/GCB2020.shtml

Data has been converted by Our World in Data from tonnes of carbon to tonnes of carbon dioxide (CO₂) using a conversion factor of 3.664.

"Statistical differences" are referred to by the Global Carbon Project as the difference between global emissions and the sum of all national emissions plus bunker fuels: this discrepancy is therefore categorized as "statistical differences".

Our World in Data have renamed the category "bunker fuels" as "International transport" which includes emissions from international aviation and shipping. We have renamed this category for clarity.

Each country and region's share of global carbon dioxide (CO₂) has been calculated by Our World in Data based on annual national emissions data published by the Global Carbon Project (GCP). This is calculated as each country's share of the sum of all country emissions plus international aviation and shipping ('bunkers') and 'statistical differences'.

Consumption-based emissions are national or regional emissions which have been adjusted for trade (i.e. territorial/production emissions minus emissions embedded in exports, plus emissions embedded in imports). If a country's consumption-based emissions are higher than its production emissions it is a net importer of carbon dioxide.

The underlying source is an updated version of the paper by "Peters et al. (2011). Growth in emission transfers via international trade from 1990 to 2008." This updated data is available in the latest version of the Global Carbon Budget. 

Our World in Data has calculated several additional metrics based on the following metrics:
– Energy consumption data from BP Statistical Review of World Energy: https://www.bp.com/en/global/corporate/energy-economics/statistical-review-of-world-energy.html
– Long-term GDP data from Maddison Project Database: https://www.rug.nl/ggdc/historicaldevelopment/maddison/releases/maddison-project-database-2018
– Population data from the UN World Population Prospects and Gapminder.
https://www.gapminder.org/
https://population.un.org/wpp/

Full reference for the CO2 emissions data from the Global Carbon Project: 
Friedlingstein, Pierre, O'Sullivan, Michael, Jones, Matthew W., Andrew, Robbie M., Hauck, Judith, Olsen, Are, Peters, Glen P., Peters, Wouter, Pongratz, Julia, Sitch, Stephen, Le Quéré, Corinne, Canadell, Josep G., Ciais, Philippe, Jackson, Robert B., Alin, Simone, Aragão, Luiz E. O. M. S., Nakaoka, Shin-Ichiro, Niwa, Yosuke, O'Brien, Kevin, Ono, Tsuneo, Palmer, Paul I., Pierrot, Denis, Poulter, Benjamin, Resplandy, Laure, Robertson, Eddy, Rödenbeck, Christian, Schwinger, Jörg, Séférian, Roland, Skjelvan, Ingunn, Smith, Adam J. P., Sutton, Adrienne J., Tanhua, Toste, Tans, Pieter P., Tian, Hanqin, Tilbrook, Bronte, van der Werf, Guido, Vuichard, Nicolas, Walker, Anthony P., Wanninkhof, Rik, Watson, Andrew J., Willis, David, Wiltshire, Andrew J., Yuan, Wenping, Yue, Xu, and Zaehle, Sönke: Global Carbon Budget 2020, Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 12, 3269–3340, https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-12-3269-2020, 2020.

sources.name: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project; BP and World Bank

fields.name: Annual CO2 emissions
fields.description: Annual production-based emissions of carbon dioxide (CO₂), measured in tonnes per year.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Annual CO₂ emissions", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from coal
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from coal", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from oil
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from oil", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from gas
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from gas", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from cement
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from cement", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from flaring
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from flaring", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions from other industry
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions from other industry", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Annual CO2 growth (%)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Annual CO2 growth (abs)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Year-on-year change in CO₂ emissions", "unit": "tonnes CO₂", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Annual consumption-based CO2 emissions
fields.description: Consumption-based emissions are national or regional emissions which have been adjusted for trade (i.e. territorial/production emissions minus emissions embedded in exports, plus emissions embedded in imports). If a country's consumption-based emissions are higher than its production emissions it is a net importer of carbon dioxide.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Consumption-based CO₂ emissions", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: CO2 emissions embedded in trade
fields.description: Net carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions embedded in trade is the net of CO₂ which is imported or exported via traded goods with an economy. A positive value here denotes a country or region is a net importer of CO₂ emissions; a negative value indicates a country is a net exporter.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions embedded in trade", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Share of CO2 emissions embedded in trade
Per capita CO2 emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "CO₂ emissions per capita", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Coal emissions (per capita)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from coal", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Oil emissions (per capita)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from oil", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from gas", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from flaring", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from cement", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Other emissions (per capita)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita CO₂ emissions from other industry", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Per capita consumption-based CO2 emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Per capita consumption-based CO₂ emissions", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Emissions embedded in trade per capita
fields.description: Net imported or exported CO₂ emissions per capita, measured as production-based emissions plus emissions embedded in imported goods, minus embedded emissions in exports.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Imported or exported CO₂ emissions per capita", "unit": "tonnes per capita", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global CO2 emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global coal emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions from coal", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global oil emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions from oil", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions from gas", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global flaring emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions from flaring", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cement emissions
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global CO₂ emissions from cement", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Cumulative CO2 emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Cumulative coal emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from coal is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from coal production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions from coal", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Cumulative oil emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from oil is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from oil from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions from oil", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Cumulative gas emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from gas is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from gas production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions from gas", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Cumulative flaring emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from flaring is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from gas flaring from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions from flaring", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Cumulative cement emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from cement is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from cement production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Cumulative CO₂ emissions from cement", "unit": "tonnes", "shortUnit": "t", "includeInTable": true, "conversionFactor": 1000000, "numDecimalPlaces": 0}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative CO2 emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods. This is given as each country or region's share of the global total.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: CO2 per GDP (kg per $PPP)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Carbon intensity: CO₂ per unit GDP", "unit": "kilograms per $PPP", "shortUnit": "kg/$", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Consumption-based CO2 per GDP (kg per $PPP)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Consumption-based carbon intensity", "unit": "kilograms CO₂ per $PPP", "shortUnit": "kg/$", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: CO2 per unit energy (kgCO2 per kilowatt-hour)
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Carbon intensity: CO₂ per unit energy", "unit": "kilograms per kilowatt-hour", "shortUnit": "kg/kWh", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative coal emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from coal is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from coal production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions from coal", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative oil emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from oil is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from oil production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of cumulative CO₂ emissions from oil", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative gas emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from gas is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from gas production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions from gas", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative flaring emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from flaring is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from flaring from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions from flaring", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: Share of global cumulative cement emissions
fields.description: Cumulative carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from cement is the total quantity of CO₂ emissions emitted from cement production from 1751 until a given year, measured in tonnes. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of global cumulative CO₂ emissions from cement", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "includeInTable": true}
